title: 13.3.5 Blue/green deployment strategy
body:
# Objective
Implement blue/green deployment strategy for zero-downtime deployments with instant rollback capability and traffic shifting.

## Requirements
- Set up blue/green infrastructure (two environments)
- Implement traffic shifting between environments
- Create deployment workflow for blue/green
- Configure health checks for new environment
- Implement gradual traffic shift (canary)
- Add instant rollback to previous environment
- Monitor deployment metrics during shift
- Automate environment cleanup after deployment
- Test disaster recovery scenarios
- Document blue/green procedures

## Acceptance Criteria
- Blue and green environments deployed
- Traffic shifts between environments seamlessly
- Zero downtime during deployments
- Canary deployment shifts 10%, 50%, 100%
- Automatic rollback on error rate increase
- Metrics monitored during deployment
- Rollback completes in under 1 minute
- Old environment kept for 24h after deployment

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #156 (Automated deployment), #145 (ALB)
- Related: #146 (CloudWatch monitoring)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 13
**Time:** 2 weeks
**Complexity:** Very High
